donor_name:
UNITED NATIONS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC &
CULTURAL ORGANIZAITON
UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
UNITED NATIONS INTER-AGENCY SECRETARIAT FOR THE INTERNATIONAL STRATEGY FOR DISASTER REDUCTION.
outputs.output_descr: As part of UNCT's vision to become a trusted policy advisor to Thailand, the project is set-up aiming for policy advocacy on emerging development issues and also to improve communications about the role of the UN.  The project funds a number of initiatives to achieve the set objectives.  These include:  Development Cooperation Seminars which brings together various stakeholders to discuss about development challenges and to formulate policy recommendations.   The project also includes National Campaign of the MyWorld and awareness-building for the Post-2015 Development Agenda as well as initiatives to implement the UN communications strategy of the UNCT.
